import './post.css' import {MoreVert} from "@mui/icons-material"; import {useState} from "react"; function Post({p}) { const [like, setLike]=useState(p.like) const [isLiked, setIsLiked]=useState(false) const public_folder=process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const likeHandler=()=>{ setLike(isLiked?like-1:like+1); setIsLiked(!isLiked); } return (
(u.id===p.userId))[0].profilePicture} alt="profile pic" className="postProfileImg" /> {Users.filter((u)=>(u.id===p.userId))[0].username} {p.date}
{p?.desc}
{like} people like it
{p.comment} comments
) } export default Post
